'''Synnorha Durothil''' was a [[baelnorn]] of the [[Durothil]] clan in [[Myth Drannor]] in [[650 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Synnorha often secretly gave advice to Clan Leader [[Uschymna Durothil]], her great-granddaughter.
document_data.History: Synnorha became a baelnorn in {{Yearlink|-800}} in order to watch over the [[Library of the Durothils]], located deep below the petrified roots of its original villa.
